aws_service_discovery_private_dns_namesp.description: Provides a Service Discovery Private DNS Namespace resource.

vpc.description: The ID of VPC that you want to associate the namespace with.

description.description: The description that you specify for the namespace when you create it.

arn.description: The ARN that Amazon Route 53 assigns to the namespace when you create it.

hosted_zone.description: The ID for the hosted zone that Amazon Route 53 creates when you create a namespace.
